amendment.description: To provide for rural health and safety education programs to address and combat the opioid abuse epidemic.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3675 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3675 proposed by Senator Moran for Senator Donnelly to Amendment SA 3399. (consideration: CR S5499-5503; text: CR S5503) To provide for rural health and safety education programs to address and combat the opioid abuse epidemic.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3675 proposed by Senator Moran for Senator Donnelly to Amendment SA 3399.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3675 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
